climbs.name: You Want A Piece Of Me

content.description: Start matched on a wide slopey ledge ~5' high, get feet, and go straight up. Be prepared for a slopey top out!
content.location: On the back hand side of the first large boulder you come to on the river approach, the one with the big scoop out of the top. Far right hand side while facing the back of the boulder.

climbs.name: Texas Is The Reason For The Season

content.description: Fun face climb that has some tricky balance moves. Stand start and go straight up on slopes and crimps.
content.location: This problem is located on the first major boulder on the right hand side of the river after the bend. The boulder has a big scoop out of the top on the river side. Walk around the back, and the problem is on the climbers left side of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on a ledge at ~3 feet. Go right and up. This problem is short, but a lot of fun with good movement on big holds.
content.location: This problem is on the right hand side of the river on the second major boulder. The boulder is low and wide, overhung, with lots of holds. The problem is on the upstream side.

content.description: Start with left hand in a good slot and right hand on hueco sidepull. Do a couple of really fun, easy moves and then decipher a very tricky top out.
content.location: In the first main group of boulders, uphill and just before the River Boulder. Climb faces downstream.

content.description: Start in a pocketed seam ~5' high. Go straight up on slopey crimps. Very fun problem!
content.location: This problem is located on the first major boulder on the right hand side of the river after the bend. The boulder has a big scoop out of the top on the river side. Walk around the back, and the problem is located near the middle of the face in a very slight diheadral.

content.description: 6+ moves to the top.  bring a pad, and some gloves lol to clear the pile of sticks and crap away from base. Only access when river is completely dry.
content.location: climb the main rock in the middle of river (when dry) problem is at upriver side of rock. See Photo

content.description: Start on flat rail and move up and right through sharp halfpad crimps to sidepull pinch
content.location: Problem starts just right of Ships Prow on flat rail.  Then goes up through thin crimps to slopey rail and top out

content.description: Funky start with a low left side pull and a mid height choice of slopers for the right. Slopey topout if you don't find the good hold.
content.location: Middle route on the downstream face of the River Boulder.

content.description: Sweet crimp problem
content.location: Start on two finger pocket and crimp, then move straight up to top out

content.description: Short and Sweet
content.location: Start low on crimp rail, move right to crimps then get high feet and move to slopers and top out

content.description: Start on good holds and climb up through the jugs till you have your feet on the good ledge. Move left onto the slab (crux) and pull up through the slopey topout.
content.location: On the upstream side of the Resident Evil boulder, towards the river.

content.description: Cool problem, but the top out is a little akward
content.location: Starts  in slot rail in alcove around the corner from amoeba orga__sms.  The problem moves up through 2 crimps and bumbs around the slopey arete, then throws to a slopey jug

content.description: Sit start below the large bulging feature with left hand on good crimp and right on a gaston sloper, then go straight up staying on the left side of the arete. Part of the bulge has broken off subsequent to the FA, resulting in a slightly easier climb.
content.location: This problem is located on the river bank side of the River Boulder, on the far right.

content.description: Start on high holds directly left of Mary Kay.
content.location: On the river boulder, bank side, directly left of Mary K (the arete).

content.description: Do start moves of Hollowgraphic and then move right through the jugs. Hardest part is not dabbing.

Awesome footwork.  Problem is really good except the rock quality is pretty low. Start holds are lose and chossy.  The first move could be skipped by starting at blocky hold in center of cave without affecting the grade 

youtube.com/watch?v=2WgIXkF…
content.location: Start deep in cave behind Resident Evil boulder on crimp rail in middle cave.  From Start move out and right to lip

content.description: Sit start and climb straight up the left side of the face, staying right of the arete.
content.location: Located on the far left side of downstream face of the River Boulder.

content.description:
Start with left hand on a good crimp at ~5' and right on a thin crimp at ~6'. Go straight up over the overlap and slab. 

  A harder variation, "Free'er At Last" (V0+), starts with the same left hand but with the right on a pinch crimp at ~4'. Definitely a fun move going to the thin crimp!
content.location: Middle of the Resident Evil Boulder on the river side.

content.description: Awesome! Just run and jump up on slab
content.location: right of Anni Kookoo.  Run up slab to low angle ramp, then make a few more moves to top

content.description: Stand start on the left side of the upstream face, beside the "eye" feature. Climb straight up, staying left.
content.location: Located on the large "Cyclops head" boulder on the bank across from the river boulder.

content.description: This problem is short, but features some fun, difficult moves. Start sitting with a poor, low left hand crimp and a better, slightly higher right hand crimp. Go up and slightly left.
content.location: Left side of the upstream face of the Teenage Drama boulder.

content.description: Low start. Go up and right on slopers with a weird top out.
content.location: This problem is located on the climbers far right of the downstream side of the River Boulder, right where the top of the boulder drops down and then levels off.

content.description: This problem is short. Sit start and go straight up.
content.location: This problem is located on the River Boulder (the huge boulder that sits in the river bed) on the left side of its upstream face.

content.description: A few roof moves lead to pulling over the bulge, crux, then pretty easy slab climbing
content.location: Starts in low right jug under roof on slab around the corner from Still Dre, then moves left to bulge.  Then goes up and right.

content.description: really fun climb; although it was alot better before we found the right hand crimp, then it got alot easier.
content.location: Starts high in Hueco feature, on face before the Resident Evil Boulder, then moves straight up to slab

content.description: Run and jump problem on the middle of the downstream face of the River Boulder. Look for a good step, run, jump, and grab the top lip where it's squared off and flat!
content.location: Down stream face of the River Boulder, between "Happy Birthday" and "Pond Sex".

content.description:
Alpha Group is the first congregation of River Boulders you will come to while walking down the river. It begins with the Scoop Boulder (a large boulder on your right with a scoop out of its top) and ends with the Resident Evil boulder (a tall free standing boulder at the river's edge). 

  Routes are sorted from nearest to furthest (when walking the approach) when sorted Right to Left.
